description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The admission of the two Germanys at the 28th General Assembly of the United nations with speeches by Walter Scheel and Willy Brandt on German U.N. policy; International Radio Show in Berlin; closing pop festival for the summer held at Luneberg Heath featuring the group 'Soft Machine'; some solutions for garbage and waste disposal shown; and advanced versions of the go-cart seen competing in championships.
